category-names.category-2: Looking at the Marvel of D.C.

$200.question: This is the legal action that King Henry the 8th sought from the Catholic Church, because a divorce would not allow him to remarry.

$400.question: Don’t look now, but this Austrian Royal family is well known for a facial feature thought to be caused by inbreeding.
$400.answer: Who are the Habsburgs or what is the Habsburg Jaw?

$600.question: Gossip has that Shah Jahan built this for his recently passed away wife out of grief for her passing.

$800.question: 16 French kings share the same name, the last of which was overthrown and beheaded.

$1000.question: This term, a play on the term for Britain’s exit from the EU, is used to describe the abrupt exit of Prince Harry and Meghan from the British royal family.

$200.question: The full version of the acronym J.A.R.V.I.S.
$200.answer: What is Just a Rather Very Intelligent System?

$400.question: This person was the first Avenger.

$600.question: 6 characters have held the title Robin, sidekick of Batman. Name 3 of them.
$600.answer: Who are Dick Grayson, Jason Todd, Tim Drake, Damian Wayne, Stephanie Brown, or Carrie Kelley?

$800.question: This stand-alone anti-hero who has teamed up with Spider-Man and the X-Men is known as ‘the merc with a mouth’.

$1000.question: Known for being the home of Superman, Batman, and the Green Lantern, this is what the acronym D.C. stands for.

$200.question: A term for a giant cloud of space dust, Latin for mist or vapor.

$400.question: These are the 4 heavenly bodies known as gas giants.
$400.answer: What are Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, and Neptune?

$600.question: Why ask for directions when you can look for this star?

$800.question: The term for a massive explosion that occurs when a star runs out of nuclear power.

$200.question: ‘20 pounds of Brown Sugar.’
$200.answer: What is Anne of Green Gables?

$400.question: This film series is the best book-to-movie adaptation starring Elijah Wood and Viggo Mortensen, spanning over 11 hours and holding 30 Oscar nominations and 17 wins.
$400.answer: What is The Lord of the Rings Trilogy?

$600.question: This book series, which includes werewolves and vampires and is named after a time of day, should never have been written and turned into a movie that should never have been produced.

$800.question: Frankly, my dear, this was the first motion picture to feature a swear word at the end of the film and became its most quotable line.
$800.answer: What is Gone With the Wind?

$1000.question: This complete British allegory book series with biblical themes was left unfinished in the film world.
$1000.answer: What is The Chronicles of Narnia?
